name: zorko
description: Open Platform to explore data and collaborate around it

scripts.docs:build: npm run docs:prepare && cd docs/ && gitbook build
scripts.docs:watch: npm run docs:prepare && cd docs/ && gitbook serve
scripts.docs:publish: npm run docs:clean && npm run docs:build && cd docs/_book && git init && git commit --allow-empty -m 'update book' && git checkout -b gh-pages && touch .nojekyll && git add . && git commit -am 'update book' && git push git@github.com:zorko-io/zorko gh-pages --force

author: nesterone
